channel.title: Aerials
channel.description:
i <3's this song
it goes like
Life is a waterfalll We drink from the river then we turn around and build up our walls
Swimming through the void we hear the word We lose our selves We find it alll
By System Of A Down

item.title: Aerials
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

[quote=“dragonfire455, post:6, topic:207441”]i like Fuck The system…

my favorite one though is tentative[/quote]

Good ones:

[ul][li]Tentative;[/li]
[li]Soldier Side;[/li]
[li]Lonely Day;[/li]
[li]Lost in Hollywood;[/li]
[li]Bubbles;[/li]
[li]Hypnotize;[/li]
[li]Question!;[/li]
[li]Chop Suey;[/li]
[li]BYOB;[/li]
[li]Toxicity;[/li]
[li]Ego Brain;[/li]
[li]Streamline;[/li]
[li]ATWA;[/li]
[li]Holy Mountains;[/li]
[li]Cigaro;[/li]
[li]Kill Rock ‘N’ Roll;[/li]
[li]Radio/Video;[/li]
[li]Sugar;[/li]
[li]Spiders;[/li]
[li]Violent Pornography;[/li]
[li]Roulette;[/li]
[li]Old School Hollywood;[/li]
[li]IEAIAIO;[/li]
[li]Science;[/li]
[li]Mr Jack;[/li]
[li]Pictures;[/li]
[li]Thetawaves;[/li]
[li]Snowblind;[/li]
[li]36.[/li][/ul]

That’s all I can think of. I think that’s it. Those are all the songs I know of and like, by System. Fuck the System is horrible imo. They’re not in order of preference.

[quote=“dragonfire455, post:1, topic:207441”]Life is a waterfalll
We drink from the river
then we turn around and build put up our walls

Swimming through the void we hear the word
We lose our selves
But we find it alll[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Aerials
item.dc:creator: @dragonfire455 dragonfire455
item.description:
@dragonfire455 wrote:

[quote=“lordbost, post:5, topic:207441”][quote]Dead man lying on the bottom of the grave
Wondering when Savior comes
Is he gonna be saved

Maybe you’re a sinner into your alternate life
Maybe you’re a joker maybe you deserve to die

They were crying when their sons left
God is wearing black
He’s gone so far to find no hope
He’s never coming back
They were crying when their sons left
All young men must go
He’s come so far to find the truth
He’s never going home

Young men standing on the top of their own graves
Wondering when Jesus comes
Are they gonna be saved

Cruelty to the winner, Bishop tells the King his lies
Maybe you’re a mourner, maybe you deserve to die
They were crying when their sons left
God is wearing black
He’s gone so far to find no hope
He’s never coming back
They were crying when their sons left
All young men must go
He’s come so far to find no truth
He’s never going home

Welcome to the Soldier Side
Where there’s no one here but me
People all grow up to die
There is no one here but me

Welcome to the Soldier Side
Where there’s no one here but me
People on the soldier’s side
There is no one here but me

[/quote][/quote]soldier side

i like Fuck The system…

my favorite one though is tentative

Read full topic
